Class ReceiptPrinter

java.lang.Object
ReceiptPrinter
public class ReceiptPrinter
extends java.lang.Object
Class that takes customer and order information to produce a receipt.

  • Method Details

    • printReceipt

      public static void printReceipt​(Customer customer, java.lang.String outputFilePath) throws java.io.IOException
      Creates a receipt and stores it in the file specified at outputFilePath.
      Parameters:
      customer - The Customer object containing information about the user's account.
      outputFilePath - The path of the file that the receipt will be output to.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if there is an issue writing to file

    • alignCenter

      private static java.lang.String alignCenter​(java.lang.String str)
      Returns a string that is aligned to the center of the receipt.
      Parameters:
      str - The string to be aligned.
      Returns:
      A string that is padded on the left to center the text in the width of the receipt.

    • alignRight

      private static java.lang.String alignRight​(java.lang.String str, int areaWidth)
      Returns a string that is aligned to the right of an area of text with width areaWidth.
      Parameters:
      str - The string to be aligned.
      areaWidth - The width of the area that the string will be aligned to.
      Returns:
      A string that is padded on the left to right-justify the text in an area with width areaWidth.

    • getPadding

      private static java.lang.String getPadding​(int paddingSize)
      Returns a String consisting of a number of spaces to be used as padding.
      Parameters:
      paddingSize - The amount of characters long the returned String should be.
      Returns:
      a String consisting of paddingSize spaces.

    • getCellText

      private static java.lang.String getCellText​(java.lang.String str, int width)
      Accepts text and the width of a cell, and returns a String representing that cell, plus a left border
      Parameters:
      str - The text in the cell
      width - The width of the cell
      Returns:
      A String consisting of a border character "|", str truncated to fit in the cell, and padding to reach width,

    • truncateString

      private static java.lang.String truncateString​(java.lang.String str, int maxWidth)
      Truncates a String to fit within a specified width
      Parameters:
      str - The String to be truncated
      maxWidth - The maximum width of the String
      Returns:
      If str.length() <= maxWidth, then returns the original string. Otherwise, return a truncated version of the string with "..." at the end, so that the entire String including the ellipsis, has width maxWidth.
